title: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter

clauses.text: Steward Council: Multi-signature stewards representing the voluntary association. Guardian UNA Board: UNA directors maintaining public benefit compliance. Identity Circle: Credential issuance and revocation circle reporting to the Guardian UNA Board.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Governance Roles

clauses.text: The Steward Council must co-sign any vault release alongside the UNA Guardian representative.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Authority Lattice

clauses.text: Emergency actions require Guardian UNA Board ratification within 48 hours.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Authority Lattice

clauses.text: Custody of all off-chain fiat accounts remains with the UNA to protect volunteer liability shields.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Asset Duties

clauses.text: Steward Council must publish custody attestations with the UNA Guardian each quarter.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Asset Duties

clauses.text: Public benefit allocations must match UNA charter impact rubric and may not exceed 35% discretionary spending.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Funding & Use-of-Funds

clauses.text: Steward Council publishes quarterly public impact statements aligned to UNA metrics.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Funding & Use-of-Funds

clauses.text: Charter amendments require dual consent from Steward Council (2-of-3) and UNA Guardian Board (simple-majority).
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Amendments

clauses.text: Only the Identity Circle may issue core identity credentials under UNA oversight.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Identity Lifecycle

clauses.text: Guardian UNA Board may suspend credentials if public benefit duties are breached.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Identity Lifecycle

clauses.text: UNA Guardian Board must conduct semi-annual audits and publish summaries within 15 days.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Transparency & Audits

clauses.text: Steward Council shall publish on-chain proofs of treasury balances monthly.
heading_path: Echo Aster Core Voluntary Association Charter
Transparency & Audits
